title: Biochemical Engineering I
description: Fundamentals of Biotechnology. Types of microorganisms and their structure. Stoichiometric and thermodynamic principles for microbial growth and metabolism. Material and energy balances for aerobic and anaerobic growth and bioreactor design. Kinetics of enzyme catalyzed reactions. 3 seminars, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as ENGR/ENVEÂ 581.
